name: GlobalGiving
0:
”Alexa, ask GlobalGiving for the featured projects.”
”Alexa, ask GlobalGiving about project Two One Three Two.”
”Alexa, ask GlobalGiving what the top education projects are.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: global giving
des: This skill lets you find information about projects on GlobalGiving. You can ask about the current featured projects or about specific ones if you already know what you are looking for. If you want to find some projects in a thematic area, like technology, all you have to do is ask and we will give you some suggestions.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
